de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.query.knn

Class LinearScanEuclideanDistanceKNNQuery<O extends NumberVector>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.query.knn.AbstractDistanceKNNQuery<O>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.query.knn.LinearScanPrimitiveDistanceKNNQuery<O>
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.query.knn.LinearScanEuclideanDistanceKNNQuery<O>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseQuery, KNNQuery<O>, LinearScanQuery

    public class LinearScanEuclideanDistanceKNNQuery<O extends NumberVector>
extends LinearScanPrimitiveDistanceKNNQuery<O>
implements LinearScanQuery
    Instance of this query for a particular database. This is a subtle optimization: for primitive queries, it is clearly faster to retrieve the query object from the relation only once!
    Since:
    0.4.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
